description: 学习过去进行时的基本用法：表示过去某个时间正在进行的动作

basic_rules: 过去进行时表示过去某个时间正在进行的动作
usage_cases: 表示过去某个时间正在进行的动作：I was reading a book at 8 o'clock yesterday. (昨天8点我正在读书)
表示过去某个时间段正在进行的动作：He was playing football from 3 to 5 yesterday. (昨天3点到5点他正在踢足球)
表示过去某个动作发生时另一个动作正在进行：When I arrived, he was sleeping. (当我到达时，他正在睡觉)
time_expressions: at + 具体时间：at 8 o'clock, at this time yesterday
from...to...：from 3 to 5, from morning to evening
when, while, as：When I arrived, While he was sleeping
common_errors: I was read a book yesterday. (错误) → I was reading a book yesterday. (正确)
He were playing football. (错误) → He was playing football. (正确)
She was go to school at 8. (错误) → She was going to school at 8. (正确)
usage_tips: 过去进行时表示过去正在进行的动作

basic_usage: I was reading a book at 8 o'clock yesterday.
He was playing football from 3 to 5 yesterday.
She was cooking dinner when I arrived.
We were studying English at this time yesterday.
They were watching TV when the phone rang.
